subject: Perjury
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds is scheduled to stand trial on March 2, 2009, after pleading not guilty Friday to 14 charges of making false statements under oath and one charge of obstruction of justice.
snippet: Barry Bonds is scheduled to stand trial on March 2, 2009, after pleading not guilty Friday to 14 charges of making false statements under oath and one charge of obstruction of justice.
